prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large prismatic geometric divine head with unique octahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating octahedron, hexagram, tetrahedron patterns, styled with Principality Authority influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by energy and neutral grey inspired by transformative structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with horoscope chart capes and stellar alignment vests with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating metallic thread for planets, elaborate with pulsing Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and octahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with star map scroll with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor SAZIAMI's profile: 'He who has true power', Aethyr ZAA, Earth element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'As SAZIAMI approaches, a wave of confidence asserts itself the atmosphere bristles with authority and clear command that cannot be ignored.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic geometric divine head with unique octahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating octahedron, hexagram, tetrahedron patterns, styled with Principality Authority influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with horoscope chart capes and stellar alignment vests
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating metallic thread for planets
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with star map scroll
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who has true power'
profile_data.essence: As SAZIAMI approaches, a wave of confidence asserts itself the atmosphere bristles with authority and clear command that cannot be ignored.
profile_data.angelic_role: Principality of Absolute Authority; leads earth-forged hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic geometric form emerging from dense earth-matter, representing the solidification of divine authority through structured manifestation. Crystalline structure symbolizes the ordered power of Geburah and the mathematical precision of divine governance.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Iron-red represents Aries' martial energy, Geburah's severity, and earthly power. Obsidian black grounds the manifestation, representing the transformative depth of earth element and mystical boundaries.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine structure, elemental balance, and quantum potential. Phase-shifting symbolizes authority's fluid yet absolute nature.
